entry.title: Axel Full Modular Lounge - Grey Gum
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Furniture Gallery
Type: Living
Price: 3497.00

Introducing the Axel Full Modular Lounge, the ultimate spacious lounge for families - with plenty of room for everyone. Comfortable, chic and versatile, this lounge features separate modular pieces that allow you to customise your seating arrangement, so you can create the perfect layout for your space and lifestyle. Each modular piece features extra wide seating, enabling more people to fit onto the lounge and giving it a luxurious feel. 

This configuration features:

  • 1 x 1.5 Seater with Left Armrest
  • 1 x Armless piece
  • 1 x Ottoman
  • 1 x Corner Seat
  • 1 x 1.5 Seater with Right Terminal

More colours available exclusively in store.

entry.title: Callista Corner Suite with Chaise
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Furniture Gallery
Type: Living
Price: 2699.00

The Callista Corner Suite with Chaise features sleek lines and a modern design, an ideal addition to any contemporary living space. With reversible seat cushions for added versatility and four throw cushions included for extra comfort and style.

entry.title: Monaco 6 Seater - Denim
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Furniture Gallery
Type: Living
Price: 3799.00

Upholstered in a WATERPROOF fabric, the Monaco is a classic sofa that seamlessly blends into any interior, with a versatile colour that offers endless styling potential. Its modern, elegant form is complemented by extra wide seating, featuring a combination of high-density foam and goose feathers for incredible comfort.

entry.title: Mornington Modular - Family Suite
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Furniture Gallery
Type: Living
Price: 6289.00

Featuring premium goose feather filled cushions, the Mornington Modular has slender track arms and is upholstered in a serene shade of grey. As a true modular, the Mornington features 5 unique pieces that can be arranged in almost endless combinations to suit your space.

This bundle includes 1x Right arm, 1x Left Arm, 1x Corner, 3x Armless and an Ottoman.

entry.title: Mornington Modular - U Shaped Lounge
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Furniture Gallery
Type: Living
Price: 7384.00

Featuring premium goose feather filled cushions, the Mornington Modular has slender track arms and is upholstered in a serene shade of grey. As a true modular, the Mornington features 5 unique pieces that can be arranged in almost endless combinations to suit your space. Features a solid beech wood frame.

This bundle includes 1x Right Arm, 1x Left Arm, 4x Armless and 2x Corner pieces (as pictured in first photo.)

entry.title: Cloud - Corner Lounge
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Furniture Gallery
Type: Living
Price: 5745.00 - 10770.00 (2 variants)

The ultimate sofa - 100% goose feather filled cushions encased in your choice of soft linen or supple cognac leather, and 3 separate modular pieces (corner, armless and ottoman) allowing endless configurations for your space. The Cloud offers unparalleled comfort and comes with a comprehensive lifetime warranty, due to its outstanding craftsmanship. *Scatter cushions included ONLY with FABRIC Cloud Modular not LEATHER.  

More colours available exclusively in store.

This bundle is comprised of 3x corner pieces and 2x armless pieces.

entry.title: Cloud Power Recliner Family Suite with Ottoman - Opulence Optical
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Furniture Gallery
Type: Living
Price: 10095.00

Experience the ultimate in luxury and comfort with the Cloud Power Recliner Corner Suite with Ottoman. Upholstered in "Opulence" fabric, designed to provide the highest grade of stain resistance. With power recliners, ottoman and a convenient console for storage, elevate your living space with this exquisite lounge suite that seamlessly combines style and comfort.

This bundle consists of 1 x left recliner, 1 x right recliner, 2 x armless recliners, 1 x corner piece, 1 x console and 1 x ottoman.

entry.title: Cloud Power Recliner Corner Suite - Opulence Optical
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Furniture Gallery
Type: Living
Price: 7897.00

Experience the ultimate in luxury and comfort with the Cloud Power Recliner Corner Suite. Upholstered in "Opulence" fabric, designed to provide the highest grade of stain resistance. With power recliners and a convenient console for storage, elevate your living space with this exquisite lounge suite that seamlessly combines style and comfort.

This bundle consists of 1 x left recliner, 1 x right recliner, 2 x armless recliners, 1 x corner piece and 1 x console.﻿

entry.title: Luna Large Corner Suite with Right Chaise - Playful Optical
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Furniture Gallery
Type: Living
Price: 7199.00

Please note: Ottoman pictured in-situ photo is purchased separately - available here.
Filled with goose feathers and featuring latex core reversible cushions for superb comfort, the Luna is the effortless sofa that's made to last (10 year seating warranty, 10 year frame warranty). Low maintenance and easy to keep clean, the slip covers are removable, waterproof and machine washable. The Luna is upholstered in a hardwearing, durable fabric that looks as luxurious as it feels. This is the dream sofa.

entry.title: Navone 6 Piece Modular WITH Ottoman - Encore Caviar
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Furniture Gallery
Type: Living
Price: 6199.00

A stunning replica of acclaimed Italian designer Paola Navone’s iconic lounge, the Navone 6 Piece Modular in Encore Caviar offers casual yet refined seating that reflects her contemporary ethos. With plush goose feathers encased in a soft fabric, the sofa’s deep, low silhouette invites you to relax.

This bundle is comprised of 1x Left Side Arm, 2x armless, 1x corner, 1x Right Side Arm and 1x Ottoman.  *Please note, this particular Navone modular bundle is available only in Encore Caviar NOT the white as pictured (see swatch image for Encore Caviar).

entry.title: Casablanca Corner Lounge - Mink
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Furniture Gallery 1
Type: Living
Price: 4999.00

For those who like their lounges extra plush, the Casablanca Corner Lounge features a decadent mix of high resilience, high density foam seat cushions and feather blend back cushions on a solid timber frame. Finished in luxe velvet with silver studding and extra scatter cushions for an upscale look and feel, the Casablanca is a statement piece that will transform your lounge room. 

Available for special order in store only.
